title: Illicit Magic
description: Life's experiences aren't always gooey or mushy like a Hallmark card.Spouses mess up.They even have the audacity to mess up on Valentine's Day,a day that a wife never forgets!Then your children make you mad.They wet their pants,and you have to hand wash thembefore the recital,because there's only one pair left.Yet, they can move you in a second's notice.The book Purposefully Annoyed & Other Short Stories is an extensive collection of stories and scenarios.This book will definitely make you thinkNot once,Not twice,but three timesabout every Moment,just like the show Seinfeld does,because well, life is Fantastically Complicated.
author: Camilla Chafer
